title: Constructivist-Based Blended Teaching Method for Developing Programming Fundamentals and Computational Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Collaboration-based project implementation in a blended learning environment combining 3D gaming and 2D programming tools

learning_goals: Students can solve problems in a 3D game environment by applying sequence and concurrency programming concepts
Students improve computational thinking competencies (decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction, algorithm design) by over 80% through collaborative learning activities
Students can produce creative applications of programming concepts through project-based assessments

resources: 3D Game Environment Platform (Similar to Second Life)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
